channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump cuts ties with Marjorie Taylor Greene, once among his top MAGA-world defenders
item.description: The dismissal of Greene — once the epitome of "Make America Great Again" — appeared to be the final break in a dispute simmering for months.

item.title: US justice department investigates Epstein's alleged ties to Clinton and banks after Trump request
item.description: Democrats are accusing Trump of using the justice department to deflect from his previous relationship with Epstein.

item.title: Trump asks Justice Department to probe Epstein's ties to Democrats, banks
item.description: President Trump accused Democrats of using what he calls the "Epstein hoax" to defect blame for the government shutdown.

item.title: Trump targets longtime MAGA ally Marjorie Taylor Greene
item.description: The Georgia congresswoman has criticised Trump's focus on foreign policy and handling of Jeffrey Epstein files.

item.title: 11/14: CBS Evening News
item.description: ‘Last Chance U’ college football coach dies after being shot; 19-year-old defeats former civics teacher in unusually supportive county race

item.title: 7/14/2024: Trump assassination attempt; Rise; Modern Ark
item.description: First, a report on the assassination attempt made on former President Trump. Then, a trip to an Austrian Alps camp for grieving Ukrainians. And, a loo...

item.title: Only 16 of over 600 detained by ICE in Chicago area have criminal histories
item.description: The Trump administration has released the names of more than 600 people detained by immigration agents, and whose arrests might have violated a court ...

item.title: Prashant Kishor: Why India's political start-ups rarely succeed
item.description: Prashant Kishor’s new party, Jan Suraaj, created a media splash but flopped, winning no seats in Bihar.

item.title: Buddy Holly crosswalk to be removed following order on roadway artwork
item.description: A crosswalk honoring Buddy Holly with a painted depiction of the rock and roll legend's iconic glasses will have to be removed from his hometown of Lu...

item.title: Trump says he will take legal action against BBC over Panorama edit
item.description: The US president confirmed he intends to sue the broadcaster for at least $1bn over the Panorama edit of a 2021 speech.

item.title: China urges citizens not to visit Japan over Taiwan row
item.description: Japanese PM Sanae Takaichi had suggested Tokyo could take military action if Beijing attacked Taiwan.

item.title: Trump scraps tariffs on beef, coffee, tropical fruit in a push to lower prices
item.description: President Trump announced the removal of U.S. tariffs on beef, coffee, tropical fruits and other commodities amid pressure to address high consumer pr...

item.title: A storm devastated Alaska Native villages. Now their public media lost funding
item.description: A public TV and radio station in Western Alaska serves dozens of villages damaged by Typhoon Halong. But with federal funding eliminated, KYUK faces s...

item.title: Better late than never: The delayed September jobs report will be out next week
item.description: The Bureau of Labor Statistics says it will report on September's job gains and unemployment rate next week. That's the first of many overdue economic...

item.title: Judge says he'll approve opioid settlement with OxyContin maker Purdue and Sackler family
item.description: A federal bankruptcy court judge said he will approve OxyContin-maker Purdue Pharma's latest deal to settle thousands of lawsuits over the toll of opi...

item.title: Emails reveal Epstein’s network of the rich and powerful despite sex offender status
